description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The History of South America ... By an American. [The preface signed: R. C.] Translated from the Spanish by Adnah D. Jones. With maps and index by the translator" Author: C., R. Contributor: JONES, Adnah David. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9770.dd.12."
